Question & Options:
In the movie 'Get Out' (2017), which of the following statements accurately describe the relationship between Rose and Walter?
Options:
A. Walter was possessed by Rose's grandfather, Roman.
B. Walter apprehended Chris on his own accord.
C. Walter temporarily regained control of his body to confront Rose.
D. Walter shot Rose and then himself.
Correct Answer: Walter was possessed by Rose's grandfather, Roman.; Walter temporarily regained control of his body to confront Rose.; Walter shot Rose and then himself.
